import React,{useState} from 'react' import {useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function UpdateBooks({book,fetch}) { console.log(book) const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const[author,setAuthor]=useState(book.author) const[title,setTitle]=useState(book.title) const[description,setDescription]=useState(book.description) const[category,setCategory]=useState(book.category) const[trending,setTrending]=useState(book.trending) const[coverImage,setCoverImage]=useState(book.coverImage) const[Price,setPrice]=useState(book.Price) const[createdAt,setCreatedAt]=useState(book.createdAt) const updatebooks=(id,obj)=>{ console.log(id) const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); axios.put(`http://localhost:4000/api/book/update/${id}`,obj,{ headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }) .then(()=>{ console.log("books added") if (token) { setIsAuthenticated(true); fetch(); navigate("/main") } }).catch((error)=>{ throw error }) } return (

) } export default UpdateBooks
